Home.title: Connect2Pet
Home.description: Connect2Pet offers a swipe-to-match experience, playfully linking future pet owners with adoptable animals in a seamless, Tinder-like adoption journey.

About.description: Connect2Pet is a web application that connects future pet owners with adoptable animals in a seamless, Tinder-like adoption journey.

questions.answer1: Connect2Pet is a web application that connects future pet owners with adoptable animals in a seamless, Tinder-like adoption journey.
questions.answer2: When completing your profile and according to your preferences, we use our data-based algorithm to provide you with pet profiles that best suit you so that you can like that pet that you like so much. Then, the caretaker of that animal will review your profile and if he or she analyzes that you are the ideal candidate, he or she will swipe to the right, resulting in a match. Then, from the chat on our platform you can begin the adoption process.
questions.answer3: To get started, simply create an account with your email and password. Once you have created an account, you can start swiping through adoptable animals in your area.
questions.question4: How do I adopt an animal?
questions.answer4: To adopt an animal, simply swipe right on the animal's profile. If the pet holder approves your request, you will be connected with the animal's profile and can begin the adoption process.
questions.question5: How do I create an account?
questions.answer5: To create an account, simply use your email and password or start with any other provider like Google.
questions.question6: Can I use Connect2Pet even if I don't desire to adopt a pet?
questions.answer6: Absolutely, that's why you can create an account with just your email and password.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: Connect2Pet is a web application that connects future pet owners with adoptable animals in a seamless, Tinder-like adoption journey.

Chats.header: Macth, chat, adopt and change your life

Onboarding.fillDetails: Fill in your details below so we can know you a little better!

userPreferences.askForMoreDetails: Just to bring you the best matches, we need to know a little more about you. Please, answer the following questions:
userPreferences.animalSpecies: In what specie(s) of animal(s) are you interested in?
userPreferences.colorsQuestion: How'd you like your pet to look like?
userPreferences.sizesQuestion: Which size would you like your future pet to have?
userPreferences.preferredAnimalPersonality: How would you like your pet's personality to be?
userPreferences.physicalConditions: Tell us about the physical conditions you'd prefer in your future pet
userPreferences.animalTrainingQuestion: Select your future pet training level
userPreferences.suitableToLiveWithAnimals: Do you want your pet to be suitable to live with other animals?
userPreferences.suitableToLiveWithKids: Do you want your pet to be suitable to live with other animals?

OrganizationOnboardingForm.introSentence: Great! Let us help you with your cause. Please, fill in the details below so we can know you a little better!

individualPetHolder.encouragePerson: Let us know who you are!
